name: when we sleep
description:
when we sleep is a 2D action platformer with puzzle elements. As a sleep paralysis demon working demonic contracts, it's your job to make it to your sleeping target without waking them and falling onto their chest. Explore your surroundings and find the quietest path, using a demonic tendril to interact and swing from objects in their room. Keep quiet and stay out of the light.

This game was created in a week as a part of Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 for the theme "it is not real".
